name: RX_RXW_COMMENTS
description: This table contains work request comments entered during work request entry or edit. These comments are used to track comments associated with the work request as it moves through the fill and dispensing processes in the pharmacy.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the work request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: Contains comments specified when pharmacy processes the record.
